title: Linda Salzman Sagan
text:
Linda Salzman is an American artist and writer.
Biography.
Salzman created the artwork for the <a href="Pioneer%20plaque">plaque on the Pioneer spacecraft</a> and coproduced the <a href="Voyager%20Golden%20Record">Voyager Golden Record</a>.
She co-authored the book "<a href="Murmurs%20of%20Earth">Murmurs of Earth</a>" with her husband, <a href="astronomer">astronomer</a> <a href="Carl%20Sagan">Carl Sagan</a>, whom she married on April 6, 1968; the marriage lasted until their divorce in 1981.
Salzman is the mother of author and screenwriter <a href="Nick%20Sagan">Nick Sagan</a>.
